summary: The comment section is overwhelmingly supportive of Pakistan, with a strong presence of national pride and religious unity among Muslims worldwide. There is significant criticism and sarcasm directed towards India, particularly its media and military, indicating a high level of controversy and polarization. The comments reflect a deep-seated animosity towards perceived biases and misinformation, alongside a celebration of Islamic unity and resistance against what is seen as Hindu nationalism. The tone ranges from humorous and sarcastic to outright hostile, with a notable absence of spam, focusing instead on geopolitical and religious solidarity.
title: India Took Over Pakistan In 1 Night...
